title: WOW GREAT PRICE LUXURY NEXT TO BEACH,2 BEDROOMS 2 FULL BATHROOMS,PATIO
posting_body: LUXURIOUSLY NEWLY REMODELED BEAUTIFUL DUPLEX LOWER UNIT for rent  in quality neighborhood little over 1000 sq approx.
AVAILABLE
NOW two bedrooms and TWO full bathrooms.
This house is located just couple of minutes away from one of the seattle's best golden garden beach.
It is 5 to 10 minutes away from  grocery stores, Safeway, Fred Meyer, Qfc.
Near to Swedish hospital,walgreens,Bartell drug pharmacy.high schools and loyal height elementry school is also available in this community.

Ballard is one of the best neighborhood in the city for dining.this house is minutes away from seattle downtown,which has an observation tower called SPACE NEEDLE(Beauty of settle).Coffee shop minute away.
RENTAL FEATURES...
..New vinyl waterproof floor excluding kitchen and bath.
..Heat oil.
KITCHEN with refrigerator,microwave,oven stove.
2 FULL BATHROOMS.One of the Bathroom newly built.
Also available laundry.
This unit has gravel Patio for sitting outside,providing chairs and umbrella, ALL FULLY totally private FENCED YARD good for pets or kids,doing BBQ.
one carport parking and enough street parking.
TERMS...
$45 dollars non refundable credit check fees( each adult)
MUST HAVE GOOD CREDIT.
PETS ARE OK (Small dog or cat)NO SMOKING INSIDE THE HOUSE.
$2495 security deposit only.
No need to pay last month on front.
IF YOU WILL HAVE ANY QUESTIONS ,OR WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE THE HOUSE INSIDE ,PLEASE CALL ME ANYTIME
